## Getting started in RStudio: packages

- Install packages (tidyverse, devtools, swirl)
- Install QSS package: 

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("kosukeimai/qss-package", build_vignettes = TRUE)
library(swirl)
install_course_github("kosukeimai", "qss-swirl")
```
